channel.title: EP/Guthans
channel.description: Is Guthan's really worth it? Will it help me stay places[barrows] longer? Just wondering..Is it possible to have over 100% ep?

item.title: EP/Guthans
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

if you have alot of money i would buy it.
i was using guthans, sgs and b2p tabs at one stage and could last atleast 10 rounds before teleing.

but if you dont have much money i really wouldnt bother, it degrades to fast and costs to much.
it can help you get into bandos teams though, but then youre stuck tanking

Read full topic

item.title: EP/Guthans
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Guthans set is cool, sure, but not necessary. I had it at some point during the last 2 weeks and I made the most of it at cave horrors. I could’ve literally camped there for god knows how long before the set would’ve degraded to 0. I also tried using at barrows but the spear doesn’t really hit at the brothers nor is the armour’s defence bonus THAT good. So uh, buy it if you want, but not just for barrows.

And you can’t have more than 100% EP. Sometimes when you’re in p2p pvp and go to a f2p pvp world, you might get over 100% for some shitty reason.

Read full topic

item.title: EP/Guthans
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“cows_be_sacred, post:3, topic:324728”]Hehe thanks. But in f2p pvp I some how had 101% ep.
If you want me to post it I can[/quote]
If you have 100% EP on p2p then you will initially have more than 100% EP on f2p. However after 15 minutes in a hot zone on f2p, it’ll be taken back down to 100%.

Read full topic

item.title: EP/Guthans
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

If you have the money, sure guthans is worth it. But I can do 6 or 7 runs with some sharks and a couple of ppots, using only veracs brassy & skirt with neit helm etc.

and >100% ep isn’t possible i don’t think
